Pre-Game Insights: Bryan Reynolds and the Pittsburgh Pirates square off against Juan Yepez and the Washington Nationals on Saturday at 6:40 p.m. ET.
The Pirates have hit 137 home runs this season, the fifth-lowest total in MLB play.
The Nationals have the 23rd-ranked ERA (4.34) in the majors this season.
The game will be held at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania.
The game will be broadcast on SportsNet Pittsburgh and available for live stream on Fubo.
